body_html: @nbogis Awesome! point 1 is fixed (if I remember correctly it was already fixed when you started working on the pull request). Sorry for being non-responsive the last couple of days, I'm back home tonight and will have more time to review the code and see if there's anything left before we merge. Thank you! ✨
